mapper.select: SELECT id, company_code, computer_name, ip, original_id, created_at FROM server_machine WHERE ip = #{ip} LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO server_machine (company_code, computer_name, ip, original_id, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{companyCode}, #{computerName}, #{ip}, #{originalId}, NOW(3), NOW(3))
mapper.update: UPDATE server_machine SET company_code = #{companyCode}, computer_name = #{computerName}, original_id = #{originalId}, updated_at = NOW(3) WHERE id = #{id}
